name: PAQ6 Compressed Archive
summary: Learn about .PAQ6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PAQ is a "data compression archiver" available for Windows and Linux. Developer Matt Mahoney released the first version of PAQ in 2002. Mahoney released the sixth version of PAQ, better known as PAQ6, in 2004.

Notably, PAQ6 allows users to specify the amount of memory needed to compress and decompress an archive. The more memory used, the higher the archive's compression ratio (and the slower the archive is compressed/decompressed).

instructions: You can use PAQ version 6 (PAQ6) to extract the files a PAQ6 archive contains. For complete instructions on how to use PAQ6, refer to the program's documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
